text: The kikkelinaamaapina (Cheirogaleus medius), is a type of lemur. It is also called the lesser dwarf lemur, western fat-tailed dwarf lemur, or spiny forest dwarf lemur. It is only lives in Madagascar. It is nocturnal. It eats insects, other small animals, fruits and flowers. An adult weighs 160 grams. ==References== Category:Lemuriformes Category:Mammals of Africa
title: Fat-tailed dwarf lemur
